nodes.text: Nussik was a Trandoshan holiday of violence, where members of the species could earn extra points with their deity, the Scorekeeper, through kills during hunting.
During Nussik, a group of spacers encountered a band of frustrated Trandoshan mercenaries, who proceeded to hunt the spacers in an attempt to appease the Scorekeeper.
Nussik was first mentioned in the 2019 Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying game supplement Allies and Adversaries.
